Text:
OOS out of snyc more than a little bit :(
Which of course can be offset in many video players. 
Not a complaint. Only an observation.

btw, the HBO web source file is oos too. 
so no fault of the anonymous uploader ;)
Thank you, again, much appreciated.
In VLC, audio delay -0.250s fixes the sync.

This version is more in sync
https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8263398/Real_Time_With_Bill_Maher_JUST_OVERTIME_2013.03.15_XviD
Thanks for this upload. As far as I know we can't get Overtime in Australia so this is really great.
